trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Mesquite
There were no other sightings in Mesquite on or around March 25th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI stand in the front yard checking my on my bar-b-que, and as usual I looked up towards the big dipper and these two star-like objects came into view . They looked like the ISS passing over but they were closer to the ground they vanished into they horizion kind of , but it was as if they cut the lights off because the trailing star switch off his lights before he made to the point where the first object turned his off. they were heading NNE they flew in a bird like formation only one was lagging behind I was puzzled because an airplane was out in the direction they went and I never heard of two satelites travel the same direction in the same orbit and stuff they turned off the lights
